text: Jean-Pierre Door (born April 1, 1942 in Sully-sur-Loire) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Loiret department, and is a member of The Republicans. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Loiret Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Social Right Category:Modern and Humanist France Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:French cardiologists
title: Jean-Pierre Door
